name: Listened to What We Expect from the Apple Event!

content.html:
Marques and Andrew discuss a few quick topics of the week (like the new Dodge Charger having a a “fake” engine sound) before diving deep into what they expect to see from the Apple event on September 7th. Then they talk about the new Xiaomi Mi Fold 2 and the state of foldable smartphones. A little EV news, some Apple predictions, and then some folding phone impressions: it’s a classic Waveform episode!
